COMMENT_TX: ej,mattd001,M,kulpr901,Intentional HBP non-call Marlins Manager Don Mattingly ejected by HP umpire Ron Kulpa
$originally scored as SB, changed to DI on 04-06-2017
$originally scored as hit by pitch, changed to walk on 04-11-2017

replay,8,zimmr001,WAS,mealj901,WAS11,O,Y,U,,H $Ryan Zimmerman's fly to CF struck the railing behind the wall and caromed back onto the field; the ball was ruled in play and Zimmerman reached 3B; crew chief Jerry Meals requested a review, which overturned the call to a home run
replay,9,gordd002,MIA,mealj901,WAS11,,N,M,MIA,C $when Dee Gordon was called out at 1B, Marlins manager Don Mattingly challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
replay,5,peraj001,SLN,scotd901,WAS11,,Y,M,WAS,C $when Jhonny Peralta was called safe at 1B, Nationals manager Dusty Baker challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
replay,3,eatoa002,WAS,scotd901,WAS11,,Y,M,WAS,C $when Gio Gonzalez was called out at 2B, Nationals manager Dusty Baker challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
replay,4,martj008,SLN,scotd901,WAS11,,Y,M,SLN,C $when Jose Martinez was called out at 1B, Cardinals manager Mike Matheny challenged the ruling; the call overturned by replay
replay,1,harpb003,WAS,scotd901,WAS11,,Y,M,SLN,A $when Anthony Rendon was called safe at 1B, Cardinals manager Mike Matheny challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay

replay,8,renda001,WAS,scotd901,WAS11,,N,M,SLN,E $when Anthony Rendon was called safe at 1B, Cardinals manager Mike Matheny challenged the slide at 2B by Adam Eaton; the slide was ruled legal by replay
replay,3,renda001,WAS,laynj901,WAS11,,N,M,PHI,C $when Anthony Rendon was called safe at 1B, Phillies manager Pete Mackanin challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay

replay,8,rivet001,NYN,barrt901,WAS11,,N,M,WAS,C $when T.J. Rivera was called safe at 1B, Nationals manager Dusty Baker challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay; Ryan Zimmerman came off the bag early to throw back to 3B
Adam Eaton left with an injured leg
replay,3,confm001,NYN,barrt901,WAS11,,N,M,WAS,A $when Zack Wheeler was called safe at 2B, Nationals manager Dusty Baker challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay

$the throw went into CF; Jayson Werth and Asdrubal Cabrera collided while no play was being made on Werth; 2B Umpire Angel Hernandez signalled obstruction but the play was allowed to proceed; once Werth was tagged out, the umpires ruled that he was not obstructed and ran to 3B at his own risk; this is one of the two obstruction types listed in the rules
Mets pitcher Noah Syndergaard left the game due to an injured back
replay,7,descd001,ARI,emmep901,WAS11,,Y,M,ARI,I $when Daniel Descalso was ruled not to have been hit by a pitch, D-Backs manager Torey Lovullo challenged the call; the call was overturned by replay
replay,7,goldp001,ARI,emmep901,WAS11,,N,M,ARI,C $when Paul Goldschmidt was called out at 1B, D-Backs manager Torey Lovullo challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
replay,4,altha001,PHI,westj901,WAS11,,Y,M,PHI,I $when Aaron Altherr was ruled not to have been hit by a pitch, Phillies manager Pete Mackanin challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay

replay,7,hernc005,PHI,westj901,WAS11,,N,U,,Q $when Cesar Hernandez ran into his own bunt, he was called out for interference; Phillies manager Pete Mackanin tried to challenge the ruling; crew chief Joe West requested a rule check and was told that this play is not reviewable
replay,9,hernc005,PHI,westj901,WAS11,,N,M,PHI,C $when Cesar Hernandez was called out at 1B, Phillies manager Pete Mackanin challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
ej,servs002,M,hamaa901,Balls and strikes Mariners Manager Scott Servais ejected by HP umpire Adam Hamari
$Bench coach Chris Speier manager the club while Dusty Baker was away attending his son's graduation
$originally scored as two-base E5, changed to double on 06-10-2017
$Bench coach Chris Speier acting as manager while Dusty Baker is attending his son's graduation
replay,3,zimmr001,WAS,laynj901,WAS11,,N,M,WAS,C $when Bryce Harper was called out at 2B, Nationals acting manager Chris Speier challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
replay,5,torrl001,SDN,laynj901,WAS11,,Y,M,SDN,A $when Chase d'Arnaud was called out at 2B, Padres manager Andy Green challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
replay,9,chirr001,TEX,danlk901,WAS11,,Y,M,WAS,A $when Pete Kozma was called safe at HP, Nationals manager Dusty Baker challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
$Last two plays really one, but must be separated for now
$Reds challenged call that Mesoraco was out at first; Call was overturned - single
$Cubs challenged call of safe on pickoff attempt; Call overturned - out on pickoff
$Cubs challenged call of force out; call overturned  - safe on fielder's choice
$Cubs challenged safe call at first; call upheld - error
ej,baked002,M,rackd901,Arguing foul tip $Washington manager Dusty Baker ejected for arguing foul tip
$Nationals challenged call that Difo was caught stealing; call was overturned - stolen base
$Mets challenged call of out at home, call was upheld - out
$umpires reviewed to be sure ball was trapped and not caught; call was upheld - single
ej,snitb801,M,everm901,arguing check swing $Braves manage Snitker ejected by 3b umpire Everitt for arguing check swing on ball 2 to Matt Wieters
$originally scored as single and missed catch error on pitcher to allow runner to reach second; changed to single plus throwing error by first baseman on 07-27-2017

ej,harpb003,P,segac901,Arguing balls and strikes $Bryan Harper complained that that the second pitch should not have been called a strike; after he struck out, he threw his bat down and kicked the dirt; plate umpire Segal then ejected him
$Nationals challenged call that Difo was out at first; call was overturned - safe on throwing error

$originally scored as RBI single with runner on first going to third on obstruction error by shortstop; changed on 07-31-2017 to runner scoring on throw, with no RBI, making two runs later in inning now earned
$Nationals challenged call that Kendrick was out at first; call was upheld - out to complete DP
$Chris O'Grady left with injured side
$Marlins challenged call that pitch had not hit Telis; call was overturned - hit by pitch
$originally scored as error, changed to single on 08-11-2017

$Gordon's ball bounced into stands for ground rule double, but umpires also called fan interference, which allowed Rojas to score; Nationals challenged the interference call and the run; call was upheld - interference and run scored
$Nationals challenged call that Dietrich was safe at first; call was upheld - forceout, no DP
$Marlins challenged call that Gordon was out at 2nd; call was upheld - caught stealing
$Harper slipped on wet base and hyperextended his left knee; MRI shows no ligament tear, but a bone bruise in his knee
$Giants challenged call that Jones was out at 1st; call was overturned - safe for single
$Yoenis Cespedes left with injured hamstring, went on DL the next day
$Nationals challenged call that Flores' hit was fair; call upheld - double
$Nationals challenged call that Jackson was out at home; they claimed the catcher did not give him a lane to slide; call was upheld - out at home
$Nationals challenged call that Turner was out at 1st; call was upheld - ground out
$Braves challenged call that Albies was out at 2nd; call was upheld - caught stealing
$Mike Foltynewicz left with injured hand
$originally scored as E6, changed to single on 09-17-2017
$originally scored as double, changed to E8 on 09-27-2017, removing RBI and making run unearned
$Nationals challenged call that ball hit by Werth on 3rd pitch was foul; call was upheld - foul ball
$Pirates challenged call that Robles was safe at 2nd on steal; call was overturned - caught stealing
$Pirates challenged call that Rendon was safe at 2nd on wild pitch; call was overturned - out advancing
$Pirates challenged call that Marte was out at 1st; call was overturned - single
$Nationals challenged call that Sanchez was out at 1st; call was overturned - single
